description.des: 1. Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
2. Proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Kotlin, Java and Objective C.
3. Hands-on working experience in cross platform development technologies (React Native, Flutter, Ionic, etc.).
4. Develop technical solutions and architectures for mobile applications and services that align with business goals.
5. Assess and analyze business requirements to create mobile architecture designs.
6. Should have extensive technical exposure in designing complex systems.
7. Identify and mitigate risks associated with the mobile solution's architecture.
8.Analyze user requirements to define business objectives.
9. Conducting software analysis, programming, testing, and debugging.
10. Ensure application designs conform with business goals
11. Identify and resolve any technical issues arising
